title: News from the North a poem on the late most horrible conspiracy against His sacred Majesty, herein is given an account of James, Duke of Monmouth who lately was seen in Ireland ... Lord Gray who was surmiz'd at Wrexam, together with a true relation of R. Rumbold and R. Nelthorp's passages on the Irish Seas ... / by an embroyan fancy of Anti-Jack Presbyter.
author: Embroyan fancy of anti-Jack Presbyter.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
